text: hi friends I'm Rachna and I'm back with

the exact amount is not relevant so we

some is used with countable and

countable nouns countable nouns are

example five friends I have five friends
and you can count them right uncountable

one water water I itself is not

example there are some vegetables in the
fridge
okay so vegetables' is the noun

now let's take a look at the next use of

and in questions only when you are

something okay so now let's take a look

I'll tell you a trick here any this is
any su remember negative and okay for
